articles.title: Box Office: ‘Mean Girls’ Struts to $3.3M in Previews, ‘Beekeeper’ Buzzes to $2.4M - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: 'The Book of Clarence' is also opening nationwide over the long Martin Luther King Jr. holiday weekend, while awards hopeful 'American Fiction' expands.
articles.content:
Mean Girls strutted to $3.3 million in previews at the North American box office, on par with Wonka.
Paramount’s movie adaptation of the Broadway musical is based on the 2004 big-screen teen comedy … [+2056 chars]

articles.title: ‘True Detective’ Gets a Rewarding Reboot in the Eerie ‘Night Country,’ Starring Jodie Foster: TV Review - Variety
articles.description: Jodie Foster and Kali Reis serve as the first female co-leads of the anthology drama for a season set in Alaska with an emphasis on the supernatural.
articles.content: Looking back, 2014 was truly a different time: Obama was in office, skinny jeans still reigned supreme and “True Detective” established itself with an unabashed emphasis on masculinity. Three years e… [+5922 chars]
